summary: This document is a deposit account opening application from Deutsche Asset & Wealth Management. It outlines various account types, customer identification policies, and terms and conditions for account holders. The document emphasizes compliance with anti-money laundering regulations and the responsibilities of account holders regarding tax obligations.
keyFacts: The document is a deposit account opening application for Deutsche Asset & Wealth Management.
It includes various account types such as checking, money market, and certificate of deposit accounts.
The application emphasizes the importance of customer identification to combat terrorism funding and money laundering.
Account holders are required to notify the bank of any changes to their personal or institutional information.
There are references to compliance responsibilities for non-US individuals and organizations regarding tax obligations.
